You can find it there : https://www.gtomega.co.uk/en-eu/collections/wheel-stands/products/dd-x-wheel-stand Best regards Michael. ---------------- De : "service@simsonn.com" <service@simsonn.com> Envoyé : lundi 20 octobre 2025 03:54 À : michael.84@wanadoo.fr Objet : Re: Desktop Fixed (Shifters) and Carbon Fiber Heel Plate informations. Hi Michael BUET, Please let me know the model of your rig and send me a photo of it. I can help you confirm whether it supports the elevated pedal base installation — in most cases, it should not be a problem. On

 Sun, 19 Oct at 5:53 AM , Michael BUET <michael.84@wanadoo.fr> wrote: Dear Support Service, I just bought a 7+R shifter and an X plus Pedals (with clutch). - The pedals are a bit to high for me and unreachable for my daughter, even when I down them at max. So I would like to add the Carbon Fiber Heel Plate. But I need to know its dimensions especially the position and size of the screw holes : I need to know if it's compatible with my pedals base. Are the screws provides with the Carbon Fiber Heel Plate, if yes what kind of screws please ? - The 7+R shifter is too far away for my daughter, so I think about the Desktop Fixed (Shifters), it seems to fix the shifter from the side, but is it possible with a shifter build in a cylinder ? Best regards. Michael Buet 5044:4206036
